alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 9:46PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Box Elder County through 1030 PM MDT... At 945 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 24 miles west of Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, or 47 miles southwest of Snowville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
